filesystem._comment: Local filesystem access. Replace the path with the directory you want Claude to be able to read and write. No extra env vars required.

github._comment: GitHub API integration for reading repos, issues, pull requests, and more. Requires a GitHub personal access token set in GITHUB_TOKEN.

postgres._comment: PostgreSQL database access. Set POSTGRES_CONNECTION_STRING to your database URL. Claude can run read and write queries.

sqlite._comment: SQLite database access via @modelcontextprotocol/server-sqlite. Pass the path to your .db file as the first argument.

brave-search._comment: Web search powered by the Brave Search API. Requires a Brave Search API key set in BRAVE_API_KEY. Sign up at https://brave.com/search/api/

puppeteer._comment: Browser automation via Puppeteer. Allows Claude to navigate web pages, take screenshots, and interact with browser-based UIs. No extra env vars required.

web-search._comment: Example SSE-type MCP server. Point url at a running SSE MCP server endpoint. Add any required auth headers below.

http-example._comment: Example streamable HTTP-type MCP server (MCP over HTTP with server-sent events). Point url at a running HTTP MCP server. Add any required auth headers below.
